7.10.23  3:55 pm   Hey Bill,

I am a full time musician and multi-instrumentalist, mostly gigging as a jazz pianist, gospel organist, and funk keyboardist in the Detroit area.

I love your music and have a particular appreciation for your songwriting and harmonic sensibilities. I have learned many of your songs.

Do you ever plan to perform your music live with a band?

I would very much like to be in that band.

Regardless, I hope all is well.
